column4: Can someone help me get PHP installed and working? I have tried re-installing via Synaptic many times with no luck. Whenever I try to open a PHP page, the browser tries to open it as a file. Why? It was working until I tried installing Drupal. Help!
do you have your PHP module loaded in apache configuration file?
How do I change the configuration file? I have only installed php5 and all other necessary files via synaptic
what ubuntu version are you using? edgy? dapper?
the latter file should have a line like: LoadModule php5_module /usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so
LoadModule php5_module /usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp5.so is in the latter, like it should
isn't there something in you apache's log file?
thanks for trying to help... I'll go back to Windows for now
